webscript.shortname: Add a Custom Property Definition to the custom model
webscript.description:
Adds a custom property definition to the custom model. If the property definition is
for an already existing property, it may not be possible to apply the changes. If there
are already instances of the property, it may not be possible to change the model.

The URL query parameter 'element' should have one of the following values:
'recordSeries', 'recordCategory', 'recordFolder' or 'record'.

The body of the post should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "name" : "rmc:sampleCustomProperty",
   "dataType" : "d:boolean",
   etc.
}
